description:
This image features a beautiful night landscape. It was shot during the 12th Brazilian Astrophotography Meeting (“EBA”), using relatively simple equipment. EBA’s site is in Goiás, a state in the Center-West region of Brazil, in which the landscape is referred to as “Cerrado” – which, in a great over-simplification, is Brazil’s equivalent of the African savana. The light pollution on the left side of the horizon is from Brasília, Brazil’s capital city, distant some 100km due South.

As some clouds passed by the beginning of the night, I decided to use the time and try something a bit different than my usual DSO/widefield work: a nightscape panorama. The camera was pointed southwest, and, besides the beautiful tree, the Southern Cross and part of Centaurus approach the western horizon in between the clouds. A beautiful moment that remembers me the great nights and the great people met there =D.

Constructive criticism, comments and suggestions are more than welcome in the comments section.

Date: 1 August 2019
Location: 12th EBA, Goiás, Brazil (Bortle 2-3, calculated SQM ~21.6)
Camera: Canon EOS 80D (stock), at ISO 3200
Optics: Canon 40mm f/2.8 STM, at f/2.8
Mount: Sky-Watcher EQ3-2, tracking
Exposure Detail: 3x30s panorama

**************[Português]

Esta imagem apresenta uma bela paisagem noturna. Foi feita durante o 12º Encontro Brasileiro de Astrofotografia (“EBA”), usando equipamento relativamente simples. O local onde o EBA é realizado fica em Goiás, estado da região Centro-Oeste do Brasil, no coração do cerrado brasileiro. A poluição luminosa no lado esquerdo do horizonte é de Brasília, distante cerca de 100 km ao sul.

Com algumas nuvens passando no início da noite, decidi usar o tempo e tentar algo um pouco diferente do meu trabalho usual de DSO/campo amplo: um panorama da paisagem noturna. A câmera foi apontada para o sudoeste e, além da bela árvore, o Cruzeiro do Sul e parte de Centaurus se aproximam do horizonte  entre as nuvens. Um momento lindo que me lembra as  noites e as pessoas maravilhosas que lá conheci = D.
title: Brazilian Skies: Cerrado
